tool_description: The Etsy API provides a simple RESTful interface with lightweight JSON-formatted responses to use many of Etsy's website features, including public profiles
name: Etsy
title: Etsy

api_list.name: getListingOffering
api_list.description: Get an Offering for a Listing

required_parameters.name: listing_id
required_parameters.description: integer >= 1

required_parameters.name: product_offering_id
required_parameters.description: integer >= 1

required_parameters.name: product_id
required_parameters.description: integer >= 1

api_list.name: getShopSection
api_list.description: Retrieves a shop section, referenced by section ID and shop ID.

required_parameters.name: shop_id
required_parameters.description:
integer >= 1
The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

required_parameters.name: shop_section_id
required_parameters.description:
integer >= 1
The numeric ID of a section in a specific Etsy shop.

api_list.name: getShopSections
api_list.description: Retrieves the list of shop sections in a specific shop identified by shop ID.

required_parameters.name: shop_id
required_parameters.description:
integer >= 1
The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

api_list.name: findShops
api_list.description: Searching shops by name. Note: We make every effort to ensure that frozen or removed shops are not included in the search results. However, rarely, due to timing issues, they may appear.

required_parameters.name: shop_name
required_parameters.description: The shop's name string.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
integer >= 0
Default: 0
The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
integer [ 1 .. 100 ]
Default: 25
The maximum number of results to return.

api_list.name: getShopByOwnerUserId
api_list.description: Retrieves the shop identified by the shop owner's user ID.

required_parameters.name: user_id
required_parameters.description:
integer >= 1
The numeric user ID of the user who owns this shop.

api_list.name: getShop
api_list.description: Retrieves the shop identified by a specific shop ID.

required_parameters.name: shop_id
required_parameters.description:
integer >= 1
The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

api_list.name: getShippingCarriers
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of available shipping carriers and the mail classes associated with them for a given country

required_parameters.name: origin_country_iso
required_parameters.description:
string <ISO 3166-1 alpha-2>
The ISO code of the country from which the listing ships.

api_list.description: Open API to retrieve the reviews from a shop given its ID.

required_parameters.name: shop_id
required_parameters.description:
integer >= 1
The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
integer >= 0
Default: 0
The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
integer [ 1 .. 100 ]
Default: 25
The maximum number of results to return.

api_list.name: getListingVariationImages
api_list.description: Gets all variation images on a listing.

required_parameters.name: shop_id
required_parameters.description:
integer >= 1
The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

required_parameters.name: listing_id
required_parameters.description:
integer >= 1
The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

api_list.name: getListingTranslation
api_list.description: Get a Translation for a Listing in the given language

required_parameters.name: listing_id
required_parameters.description:
integer >= 1
The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

required_parameters.name: shop_id
required_parameters.description:
integer >= 1
The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description:
string
The IETF language tag for the language of this translation. Ex: de, en, es, fr, it, ja, nl, pl, pt, ru.

api_list.name: getListingImages
api_list.description: Retrieves all listing image resources for a listing with a specific listing ID.

required_parameters.name: listing_id
required_parameters.description:
integer >= 1
The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

required_parameters.name: shop_id
required_parameters.description:
integer >= 1
The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://etsy4.p.rapidapi.com/v3/application/shops/18372436/listings/1005174422/images"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "etsy4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://etsy4.p.rapidapi.com/v3/application/shops/{shop_id}/listings/{listing_id}/images"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "etsy4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getListingsByShopSectionId
api_list.description: Retrieves all the listings from the section of a specific shop.

required_parameters.name: shop_id
required_parameters.description:
integer >= 1
The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

required_parameters.name: shop_section_ids
required_parameters.description: A list of numeric IDS for all sections in a specific Etsy shop.

optional_parameters.name: sort_on
optional_parameters.description:
Default: "created"
Enum: "created" "price" "updated"
The value to sort a search result of listings on. NOTE: sort_on only works when combined with one of the search options (keywords, region, etc.).

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
integer >= 0
Default: 0
The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
integer [ 1 .. 100 ]
Default: 25
The maximum number of results to return.

optional_parameters.name: sort_order
optional_parameters.description:
Default: "desc"
Enum: "asc" "ascending" "desc" "descending" "up" "down"
The ascending(up) or descending(down) order to sort listings by. NOTE: sort_order only works when combined with one of the search options (keywords, region, etc.).

integer >= 1
The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

integer >= 1

api_list.name: getFeaturedListingsByShop
api_list.description: Retrieves Listings associated to a Shop that are featured.

required_parameters.name: shop_id
required_parameters.description:
integer >= 1
The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
integer >= 0
Default: 0
The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
integer [ 1 .. 100 ]
Default: 25
The maximum number of results to return.

api_list.name: getListingsByListingIds
api_list.description: Allows to query multiple listing ids at once. Limit 100 ids maximum per query.

required_parameters.name: listing_ids
required_parameters.description: The list of numeric IDS for the listings in a specific Etsy shop.

optional_parameters.name: includes
optional_parameters.description:
Default: ""
Items Enum: "Shipping" "Images" "Shop" "User"
An enumerated string that attaches a valid association. Acceptable inputs are 'shop', 'images' and 'user'. Default value is an empty array.

api_list.name: findAllActiveListingsByShop
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of all active listings on Etsy in a specific shop, paginated by listing creation date.

required_parameters.name: shop_id
required_parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

optional_parameters.name: keywords
optional_parameters.description:
Default: null
Search term or phrase that must appear in all results.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
integer >= 0
Default: 0
The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Default: 25
The maximum number of results to return.

api_list.name: findAllListingsActive
api_list.description: A list of all active listings on Etsy paginated by their creation date. Without sort_order listings will be returned newest-first by default.

optional_parameters.name: taxonomy_id
optional_parameters.description:
Default: null
The numeric taxonomy ID of the listing. The seller manages listing taxonomy IDs for their shop. See SellerTaxonomy for more information.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
integer >= 0
Default: 0
The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

optional_parameters.name: max_price
optional_parameters.description:
Default: null
The maximum price of listings to be returned by a search result.

optional_parameters.name: min_price
optional_parameters.description:
Default: null
The minimum price of listings to be returned by a search result.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
integer [ 1 .. 100 ]
Default: 25
The maximum number of results to return.

optional_parameters.name: shop_location
optional_parameters.description:
Default: null
Filters by shop location. If location cannot be parsed, Etsy responds with an error.

optional_parameters.name: sort_order
optional_parameters.description:
Default: \\\"desc\\\"
Enum: \\\"asc\\\" \\\"ascending\\\" \\\"desc\\\" \\\"descending\\\" \\\"up\\\" \\\"down\\\"
The ascending(up) or descending(down) order to sort listings by. NOTE: sort_order only works when combined with one of the search options (keywords, region, etc.).

optional_parameters.name: keywords
optional_parameters.description:
Default: null
Search term or phrase that must appear in all results.

optional_parameters.name: sort_on
optional_parameters.description:
Default: \\\"created\\\"
Enum: \\\"created\\\" \\\"price\\\" \\\"updated\\\"
The value to sort a search result of listings on. NOTE: sort_on only works when combined with one of the search options (keywords, region, etc.).

api_list.name: getListing
api_list.description: Retrieves a listing record by listing ID.

required_parameters.name: listing_id
required_parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

optional_parameters.name: includes
optional_parameters.description:
Default: \"\"
Items Enum: \"Shipping\" \"Images\" \"Shop\" \"User\"
An enumerated string that attaches a valid association. Acceptable inputs are 'shop', 'images' and 'user'. Default value is an empty array.

api_list.name: getPropertiesByTaxonomyId
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of product properties, with applicable scales and values, supported for a specific seller taxonomy ID.

required_parameters.name: taxonomy_id
required_parameters.description: The unique numeric ID of an Etsy taxonomy node, which is a metadata category for listings organized into the seller taxonomy hierarchy tree. For example, the \"shoes\" taxonomy node (ID: 1429, level: 1) is higher in the hierarchy than \"girls' shoes\" (ID: 1440, level: 2). The taxonomy nodes assigned to a listing support access to specific standardized product scales and properties. For example, listings assigned the taxonomy nodes \"shoes\" or \"girls' shoes\" support access to the \"EU\" shoe size scale with its associated property names and IDs for EU shoe sizes, such as property value_id:\"1394\", and name:\"38\".

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://etsy4.p.rapidapi.com/v3/application/seller-taxonomy/nodes/1429/properties"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "etsy4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://etsy4.p.rapidapi.com/v3/application/seller-taxonomy/nodes/{taxonomy_id}/properties"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "etsy4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getSellerTaxonomyNodes
